attributes.action: Put England into full lockdown until enough people have been vaccinated
attributes.additional_details: When enough people have been vaccinated and it is safe enough to resume our tier system we should start putting countries back into tiers.
attributes.background: We need to go back into full lockdown until enough people have been vaccinated because that will limit the deaths to the least it can be and it will take the pressure off the NHS.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced a new national lockdown, and said that future changes to restrictions will depend on the rollout of the vaccine programme: https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/prime-ministers-address-to-the-nation-4-january-2021

You can read the current lockdown rules here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/national-lockdown-stay-at-home
